comment: She's a tough grader and is very particular.Weekly quiz, 2-3 discussion posts a week and (replies are very important) must turn everything on time she will not accept anything late. Get ready to read a TON.

If you are not ready to teach yourself everything and read every chapter of the textbook, then this class might not be the best for you. 2-3pg essays every other week, a quiz, and 2 discussion posts every other week too. I've been doing good so far, but you have to make sure to keep up with things. Very particular grader.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers
